Class PollingHandler

    • com.onshape.api.base.PollingHandler

extends Object
    Utility class for polling GET methods
    Author:
    Peter Harman peter.harman@cae.tech

      • poll

        public <T> CompletableFuture<T> poll​(String href,
                                     Class<T> responseType,
                                     Predicate<T> until)
        Request the given URL until the predicate is satisfied on the response object. Returns a CompletableFuture that supports blocking, cancellation or concurrent usage.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The response type
        Parameters:
        href - The URL
        responseType - Class object of response type
        until - Predicate to be satisfied
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture of the response
